explains: adj. （物质）有荧光的，发荧光的；（颜色、材料等）色彩亮丽的，发亮的
wordGroup: fluorescent lamp 荧光灯；日光灯；荧光灯管
fluorescent probe 荧光探针；荧光探测器
fluorescent screen 荧光屏；萤光板；荧光幕
fluorescent tube 日光灯；荧光灯管；荧光灯
fluorescent lighting 荧光照明；荧光灯照明
vacuum fluorescent display 真空荧光显示器

sentences.en: The strap has a fluorescent coating that glows in the dark.
sentences.cn: 皮带面上有一层荧光在黑暗中微微发光。

sentences.en: Fluorescent lights flickered, and then the room was blindingly bright.
sentences.cn: 荧光灯闪了闪，接着房间里就亮得令人目眩了。

sentences.en: Fluorescent lights flickered, and then the room was brilliantly, blindingly bright.
sentences.cn: 荧光灯闪烁了几下，然后房间就亮得刺眼。
